product_name: Louis Garneau Supra Lite T-Shirt - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Thanks to ultralight mesh panels that wick moisture, dry fast and won't develop odors, the women's Supra Lite T-Shirt from Louis Garneau is built for running-hard. Polyester shirt has Carbon Ion Mesh knit panels under the arms and across the back. Mesh has a textured back that won't stick to your skin; it wicks moisture, provides a cooling zone and dries quickly. Cocona(R) fibers made of activated carbon from salvaged coconut shells are fused into the Carbon Ion Mesh to aid wicking and breathability and reduce odor. Rated UPF 50+. Running-specific V-neck collar allows good movement and ventilation. Seams stretch for comfort. Louis Garneau Supra Lite T-Shirt for women features reflective accents front and back. Closeout.
short_description: Thanks to ultralight mesh panels that wick moisture, dry fast and won't develop odors, the women's Supra Lite T-Shirt from Louis Garneau is built for running-hard.
